products.title: Splash Vine Green Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Vine Green Panel Blind in Green. Made to measure from £36.61 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our moisture-resistant Splash vine green panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space.  The lush green panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its calming, saturated shade. 
 
As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,.5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make.  A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design. 
 
Panel blinds add a really modern feel to any space and at Swift Direct Blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of our free 5 year guarantee, which means investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.  
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0218 Fabric Colour: Vine Green Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Aluminium 5 channel track     Control Type: Cord or Wand Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Moss Green Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Moss Green Panel Blind in Green. Made to measure from £36.61 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Moss Green Panel blinds are a fabulous way to dress your window.  The light green, moisture-resistant fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space.  Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe.  As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with our 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.  
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0258 Fabric Colour: Moss Green Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Aluminium 5 channel track     Control Type: Cord or Wand Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Voile FR Sage Green Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Voile FR Sage Green Panel Blind in Green. Made to measure from £39.38 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Flame Retardant Voile range of fabrics are both beautiful & contemporary. This mint green panel blind is a very stylish, on trend colour choice.  Our Voile Sage Green panel is also allergy resistant which means it is the best choice for bedrooms and kitchens. At Swift Direct Blinds, our modern, panel blinds are put together by the industry experts with decades of experience behind them, as such we are so confident with our high quality products, that this panel blind is covered with our FREE 5 year guarantee, provided for extra peace of mind when investing in our blinds.
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0213 Fabric Colour: Sage Green Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Aluminium 5 channel track     Control Type: Cord or Wand Energy Saving Rating: ER1 - Lowest Energy Saving Value - Due to Blind Type or Fabric Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Bella Blackout Vine Green Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Vine Green Panel Blind in Green. Made to measure from £42.92 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home! 
 
This bright lime green panel blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure panel blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.  Our panels are great for privacy and light control, especially for large spaces - reaching up to 5 metres width and 3 metres drop! 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This green panel blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0219 Fabric Colour: Vine Green Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: White Aluminium     Control Type: Cord or Wand Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Splash Mirage
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Splash Mirage Standard Panel Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Standard Panel Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 600mm Max Width: 5000mm
 	Min Drop: 450mm Max Drop: 3500mm
 	Composition: Polyester
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.
 	Controls: Wand control attached to lead panel(s) to manually pull panels across.
 	Headrail: Robust white aluminium track, track depth varies depending on number of panels required.
 	Fixings: Top fix or face fix brackets.
